list_definition.definition: to watch or protect (an area) by moving continually around or through it
a group of people etc who patrol an area

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They came across several army patrols in the hills.

list_definition.definition: the act of watching or guarding by patrolling

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The soldiers went out on patrol
